text: Elena Zakharovna Machabeli (born 1906, date of death unknown) was a Soviet sculptor. A heroic monument to her design was erected in Mtskheta, Georgia, in 1949. ==References== *John Milner, A Dictionary of Russian and Soviet Artists 1420-1970. Woodbridge, Suffolk; Antique Collectors' Club, 1993. Category:1906 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Soviet sculptors Category:20th- century sculptors
title: Elena Machabeli
